title: Expert Course on CBETC-Based Customized Mathematics Instructional Design at Scale

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and fundamental principles of instructional design
context.additional_context: A course developing CBETC implementation capabilities through project-based assessments in digital-enabled learning environments

learning_goals: Can explain the core principles and objectives of CBETC (Customized Blended Education Technology Integration) with over 80% accuracy
Can develop a mathematics education design tailored to learners' levels, integrating three or more diverse instructional methods
Can design a personalized feedback system using digital tools and establish a student progress management process
Can create an assessment rubric to quantitatively measure the effectiveness of CBETC implementation through project-based evaluation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
